statements: SELECT * FROM FakeNewsMonitoring;
SELECT news_title, media_channel FROM FakeNewsMonitoring;
SELECT news_title, media_channel, reported_date FROM FakeNewsMonitoring ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE media_channel = 'CNN';
SELECT id, news_title, source_url FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, news_title, media_channel, reported_date, source_url FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT news_title, media_channel, reported_date FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE media_channel = 'CNN' ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT id, news_title, media_channel FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id;
SELECT news_title, media_channel FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE source_url LIKE '%foxnews.com%' OR source_url LIKE '%cnn.com%';
SELECT id, news_title, media_channel, reported_date FROM FakeNewsMonitoring WHERE media_channel IN ('CNN', 'Fox News') AND reported_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM news_articles WHERE media_source = 'CNN';
SELECT article_id, article_title, publication_date FROM news_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM news_articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM misinformation_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT article_title, article_content, publication_date FROM news_articles WHERE media_source = 'CNN';
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT article_id, article_title, media_source FROM news_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT news_articles.article_title, misinformation_reports.report_description FROM news_articles JOIN misinformation_reports ON news_articles.article_id = misinformation_reports.article_id;
SELECT article_id, publication_date, media_source FROM news_articles WHERE publication_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY media_source ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_channel;
SELECT channel_name, country FROM media_channel WHERE country ='USA';
SELECT article_title, author, published_date FROM news_article ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, language FROM media_channel WHERE language='English' ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, author, published_date FROM news_article WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM media_channel WHERE country='USA';
SELECT article_title, author, published_date FROM news_article WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, language FROM media_channel ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM misinformation_report WHERE report_reason LIKE '%misinformation%';
SELECT article_title, author, published_date, channel_name FROM news_article JOIN media_channel ON news_article.channel_id = media_channel.channel_id;
SELECT * FROM fake_news WHERE news_id = 1
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM fake_news ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM fake_news WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM media_channels WHERE channel_country IS NULL
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM news_sources
SELECT * FROM fake_news
SELECT news_id, news_title FROM fake_news WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM media_channels WHERE channel_country = 'USA' ORDER BY channel_name DESC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM news_sources WHERE source_type = 'Online' AND source_name LIKE '%Blog%'

SELECT f.news_title, m.channel_name, n.source_name FROM fake_news f JOIN news_mentions nm ON f.news_id = nm.news_id JOIN media_channels m ON nm.channel_id = m.channel_id JOIN news_sources n ON nm.source_id = n.source_id ORDER BY f.news_title ASC
SELECT * FROM news_outlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM news_outlets WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, follower_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM news_outlets WHERE outlet_type = 'TV news' ORDER BY outlet_name DESC;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, follower_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE follower_count > 10000 AND following_count < 5000;
SELECT post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM news_outlets JOIN news_articles ON news_outlets.outlet_id = news_articles.outlet_id WHERE article_title LIKE '%COVID%';
